unnormalised: Khoi, konnem Obstetrics & Gynecology-ntlem chukiche vicharancher prashn kelo. Kamar kas, lokanno, kiteak hem shetr ekdom old wives' tales ani tumchi Dadi tumkam sangta tenna bhair poddta.
normalised: Teka, konnem Obstetrics ani Gynecology-antlea sadarponnache galat kalponanche vixim vicharlem. Tyaar zaat, lokanno, kiteak hem shetr mhanjhech burdhivant baileanche kothaam ani tumchea Dadi-n tumkam sangitil'lea vostunchem ek khaniz shetr aasa.

unnormalised: Poilem, masik dhukhnicher uloioum-ia. "Hem sogllem tumchea mathyan asa" vo "hem ek bailek asanchem dukk" hi kotha suryacher uddounk zai. Dysmenorrhea khorem asa, ani kednam kednam tankam gorom udkacho zago ani chai poryant chodd zai. Tum funkshon korchekhatir dinak 5-6 Ibuprofen 400mg gheta, tor kripa korun gyno-k bhett dhi. gambhiraien.
normalised: Poilem, aami periodache dukhi vixim uloyaam. "Tem tumchea mathhyaantuch aasa" vo "tem ek bail zaavpacho ek bhaag aasa" hi mithaaka sooryant udovpachi garaj aasa. Dysmenorrhea ek khoree vostu aasa, ani kednaakai tem ek dhova dhovachem bag ani thoddea chai-k poraadhik garaj aasa. Tum dinak paanch te so Ibuprofen chaar sau milligram faqat kaam korpak popp kortaat zale, dayaluponna-n gyno-k mellat, gambhirtayaa-n.

unnormalised: Ani magir garbhavasthent "donank jevop" hi vostu asa. Poll, tum ek monis vaddoita, ek lhan gaanv nhoi. Tumkam extra nutrients zai, punn 2x parathe nhoi. Tumchea doctork ek bore garbhavasthechi diet-cher uloi - sodanch ek extra butter chicken ekshepannak avoid korat (maf korat lokanno). 300-400 extra calories-cher aim korat, Haldiram’s-chem pure menu nhoi.
normalised: Ani maga tumi garbhdhaarache velea "donaak khaavpache" vostu aasa. Povaat, tum ek monis vaddavtaat, lhaan gaav naii. Tumkam jaasti poshak tatvaanche garaj aasa, nischit, pan donaaka parathas naii. Tumchea doctor-ank ek nirogi garbhdhaarache aahaara vixim ulaat, kadachit aathode ek "treat" mhunn jaasti butter chicken-ak talyaat (sorry lokanno). Ek jaasti teen sau te chaar sau calories-ak dhyaas dharaat, Haldiram's-ache purnn menu-ak naii.

unnormalised: Ani ek rathn: “ekdam C-section, sodanch C-section.” VBACs (Vaginal Birth After Cesarean)-ak risks asat zalearui, te chodd korun ek bore option astat. Tumchea doctork tumchea options-cher ani tum ek bore candidate astole ki na uloi. Dr. Sharma AIIMS Delhi-nt VBAC-nt expert asa ani 70% success rate asa. Sanglem mhunn…
normalised: Ani ek aanik ratn: "ek C-section, sodanch ek C-section." V-B-A-C-s (Vaginal Birth After Cesarean)-nk jokhima aasti astana, tem sadarponna-n ek vikalp aasa. Tumchea doctor-ank tumchea vikalpache vixim ulaat ani tum ek bori umedwaar aaso kay naii. Doctor Sharma A-I-I-M-S Delhi-nt V-B-A-C-nt vishisht aasa ani satarponnakaarate satthar dharnekaa aasa. Fiqat sangtaa...

unnormalised: Ani nischit rupan, vhoddlem: "tum eka cheddyak pollyad torui tum garbhest zatole!". Hanv hea vishwasak prashansa kartam, punn tem puren sorem nhoi. Condoms thaun IUDs thaun pills poryant kitletorio contraception upay uplabd asat. Tumchea gyno-cher tumkam zai tem khojun kaddat. Fuddari ani bore vicharancher ekuch asro gheunk naka (tumchea fuddareancho prescription pad nasel tor).
normalised: Ani nischitponna-n, vhoddli: "tum eka bhurgeak faqat polot zale tum garbhdhaar zataat!". Mhanv hya mithache aashavaadi aatmaak saantyaat, tem purem khorem naii. Contraception-ache anek rupaye upalabdh aasa, condoms thavno I-U-D-s thaavn pills-ak. Tumchea gyno-kaa sangaata sarkhaa zaat tumchea bhovtak ek sodpache. Praarthanaam ani bore iradyaache akalyaa-n aadhar dovornakaat (jhaa-lay tumchea praarthanaache kodde ek prescription pad aasa asli).

unnormalised: Oh, ani “prepone” garbhavasthechi jahirat-chem pisha vishrunk naka. Tum ek train departure nhoi, tum ek miracle! Udka haddchekhi goroz na vo sogleank week 12-nt sangchekhi goroz na tumkam zai nasel tor. Tumchem shorir, tumchem kaam.
normalised: Oh, ani "prepone" garbhdhaarache ghoshnache nirarthak-kaai visornakaat. Tum train prastaan naii, tum ek chamatkaar aasa! Tumchem shareer, tumchem dhandhe.

unnormalised: Ani gambhiraien, internet-cher vachat tem sogllem mandunk soddat naka (ho post aslolyari…khas korun). Tumkam tumchea reproductive health-cher chinta asa tor, eka zivitache, layak gynecologist-ak bhett dhi. "Vaginal discharge ghorche upay" Googling korop ek proper diagnosis-ak badli nhoi. Tumchea bits and bobs tumchem dhanyavad kartole.
normalised: Ani gambhirtayaa-n, tumi internet-ant vaaktaa titlyaak sogllea vixwas dovornakaat (hoi, hya post-akui...ek prakar). Tumchea utpadan nirogya vixim chinta aasti zale, ek khoreo-jibentaant, yogya gynecologist-ank mella. "Vaginal discharge ghora-antlea upaayaak" Googling korop ek yogya nidaanache jaagek naii. Tumchea bits ani bobs tumkam dhanyavaad kortaa tyaa khatir.

unnormalised: Xevttak, tumak sompeponnan garbhest zaunk zata tor, dusre pavtt sompeponnan garbhest zaunk zata hachi vicharana. Ek baaylen ji 24 vorsamni aplem poilem bhurgem sompeponnan zolm dillem tinnem 34 vorsamni aplem dusrem garbhest zaunk titlench sompem zatolem mhunn dharlem. Ek vors ani ardem magir, ani fertility specialist-ak prashn korun, tinnem shock zalo ani tinnem thoddem fuddlean prayatn kelo zalear borem astolem mhunn tichem ichha aslem. Yaad dovorat, dor ek zann weglla ani dor ek garbhavasthe weglli.
normalised: Xevottaa, tum sodarponnaa-n garbhdhaar zataat zale, tum sodarponnaa-n don paavtim garbhdhaar zataat hi vichar. Ek bail ji ekvis varshaa-chea velean aavdaai-nk aasu-n poilem baal zalle, ti chinta kortaa trikyaalis varshaa-chea velean don paavtim garbhdhaar zaavpak titlichem sukhem zaavpaak. Ek varsh ani aadhe thaun vegaallo zaalyaa-n, ani ek fertility specialist-achaa sangaata sarkhaa zaalyaa-n, ti achambeet zalle ani ti thodde vedde zaalyari try kortaa astali mhunn tikee ashi. Yaad dovraa, konnui vegaallo aasa ani her garbhdhaar vegaalli aasa.

unnormalised: Khas korun, dor ek vishoi lloon ghyat, experts-ak prashn korat, ani yaad dovorat, tumchem shorir ek mandir asa (ek mandir jek kitin pauttim boreen dhuvonk ani ek layak OB/GYN-achea professional maintenance-chi goroz asta). Borem bhag tumkam bhair!
normalised: Mooloponnkaa-n, soglyaak meetache danaam thaavn gheyaat, experts-ank sangaata sarkhaa zaat, ani yaad dovraa, tumchem shareer ek dewal aasa (ek dewal zyaa kodde kednaakai ek bori jhaad korpachi ani ek yogya O-B slash G-Y-N thaavn thodde peshewar jatanachi garaj aasa). Boree divas tumkam!
